methods.short:
Set to 1 a range of bits.

See also: gtc_bitfield

methods.name: glm::bitfieldFillOne
methods.parameters: genIUType Value, int FirstBit, int BitCount
methods.short:
Set to 1 a range of bits.

See also: gtc_bitfield

Set to 0 a range of bits.

See also: gtc_bitfield

methods.name: glm::bitfieldFillZero
methods.parameters: genIUType Value, int FirstBit, int BitCount
methods.short:
Set to 0 a range of bits.

See also: gtc_bitfield

methods.name: glm::bitfieldInterleave
methods.parameters: glm::int8 x, glm::int8 y
methods.short:
Interleaves the bits of x and y. The first bit is the first bit of x followed by the first bit of y. The other bits are interleaved following the previous sequence.

See also: gtc_bitfield

methods.name: glm::bitfieldInterleave
methods.parameters: glm::uint8 x, glm::uint8 y
methods.short:
Interleaves the bits of x and y. The first bit is the first bit of x followed by the first bit of y. The other bits are interleaved following the previous sequence.

See also: gtc_bitfield

methods.name: glm::bitfieldInterleave
methods.parameters: glm::int16 x, glm::int16 y
methods.short:
Interleaves the bits of x and y. The first bit is the first bit of x followed by the first bit of y. The other bits are interleaved following the previous sequence.

See also: gtc_bitfield

methods.name: glm::bitfieldInterleave
methods.parameters: glm::uint16 x, glm::uint16 y
methods.short:
Interleaves the bits of x and y. The first bit is the first bit of x followed by the first bit of y. The other bits are interleaved following the previous sequence.

See also: gtc_bitfield

methods.name: glm::bitfieldInterleave
methods.parameters: glm::int32 x, glm::int32 y
methods.short:

methods.name: glm::bitfieldInterleave
methods.parameters: glm::uint32 x, glm::uint32 y
methods.short:
Interleaves the bits of x and y. The first bit is the first bit of x followed by the first bit of y. The other bits are interleaved following the previous sequence.

See also: gtc_bitfield

methods.name: glm::bitfieldInterleave
methods.parameters: glm::int8 x, glm::int8 y, glm::int8 z
methods.short:
Interleaves the bits of x, y and z. The first bit is the first bit of x followed by the first bit of y and the first bit of z. The other bits are interleaved following the previous sequence.

See also: gtc_bitfield

methods.name: glm::bitfieldInterleave
methods.parameters: glm::uint8 x, glm::uint8 y, glm::uint8 z
methods.short:
Interleaves the bits of x, y and z. The first bit is the first bit of x followed by the first bit of y and the first bit of z. The other bits are interleaved following the previous sequence.

See also: gtc_bitfield

methods.name: glm::bitfieldInterleave
methods.parameters: glm::int16 x, glm::int16 y, glm::int16 z
methods.short:
Interleaves the bits of x, y and z. The first bit is the first bit of x followed by the first bit of y and the first bit of z. The other bits are interleaved following the previous sequence.

See also: gtc_bitfield

methods.name: glm::bitfieldInterleave
methods.parameters: glm::uint16 x, glm::uint16 y, glm::uint16 z
methods.short:
Interleaves the bits of x, y and z. The first bit is the first bit of x followed by the first bit of y and the first bit of z. The other bits are interleaved following the previous sequence.

See also: gtc_bitfield

methods.name: glm::bitfieldInterleave
methods.parameters: glm::int32 x, glm::int32 y, glm::int32 z
methods.short:
Interleaves the bits of x, y and z. The first bit is the first bit of x followed by the first bit of y and the first bit of z. The other bits are interleaved following the previous sequence.

See also: gtc_bitfield

methods.name: glm::bitfieldInterleave
methods.parameters: glm::uint32 x, glm::uint32 y, glm::uint32 z
methods.short:
Interleaves the bits of x, y and z. The first bit is the first bit of x followed by the first bit of y and the first bit of z. The other bits are interleaved following the previous sequence.

See also: gtc_bitfield

methods.name: glm::bitfieldInterleave
methods.parameters: glm::int8 x, glm::int8 y, glm::int8 z, glm::int8 w
methods.short:
Interleaves the bits of x, y, z and w. The first bit is the first bit of x followed by the first bit of y, the first bit of z and finally the first bit of w. The other bits are interleaved following the previous sequence.

See also: gtc_bitfield

methods.name: glm::bitfieldInterleave
methods.parameters: glm::uint8 x, glm::uint8 y, glm::uint8 z, glm::uint8 w
methods.short:
Interleaves the bits of x, y, z and w. The first bit is the first bit of x followed by the first bit of y, the first bit of z and finally the first bit of w. The other bits are interleaved following the previous sequence.

See also: gtc_bitfield

methods.name: glm::bitfieldInterleave
methods.parameters: glm::int16 x, glm::int16 y, glm::int16 z, glm::int16 w
methods.short:
Interleaves the bits of x, y, z and w. The first bit is the first bit of x followed by the first bit of y, the first bit of z and finally the first bit of w. The other bits are interleaved following the previous sequence.

See also: gtc_bitfield

methods.name: glm::bitfieldInterleave
methods.parameters: glm::uint16 x, glm::uint16 y, glm::uint16 z, glm::uint16 w
methods.short:
Interleaves the bits of x, y, z and w. The first bit is the first bit of x followed by the first bit of y, the first bit of z and finally the first bit of w. The other bits are interleaved following the previous sequence.

See also: gtc_bitfield

methods.name: glm::bitfieldRotateLeft
methods.parameters: genIUType In, int Shift
methods.short:
Rotate all bits to the left. All the bits dropped in the left side are inserted back on the right side.

See also: gtc_bitfield

Rotate all bits to the left. All the bits dropped in the left side are inserted back on the right side.

See also: gtc_bitfield

methods.name: glm::bitfieldRotateRight
methods.parameters: genIUType In, int Shift
methods.short:
Rotate all bits to the right. All the bits dropped in the right side are inserted back on the left side.

See also: gtc_bitfield

Rotate all bits to the right. All the bits dropped in the right side are inserted back on the left side.

See also: gtc_bitfield

methods.name: glm::mask
methods.parameters: genIUType Bits
methods.short:
Build a mask of 'count' bits

See also: gtc_bitfield

Build a mask of 'count' bits

See also: gtc_bitfield

_name: glm::bitfieldInterleave_
_returns: glm::int32_
_returns_description: _
_parameters: glm::int16 x, glm::int16 y_
_version_started: 0.10.0_
_version_deprecated: _
_summary: _
_constant: False_
_static: False_
_visible: True_
_advanced: False_
-->

_inlined_description: _

Interleaves the bits of x and y.
The first bit is the first bit of x followed by the first bit of y.
The other bits are interleaved following the previous sequence.


**See also**: gtc_bitfield





_description: _

-->

_inlined_description: _

Interleaves the bits of x, y, z and w.
The first bit is the first bit of x followed by the first bit of y, the first bit of z and finally the first bit of w.
The other bits are interleaved following the previous sequence.


**See also**: gtc_bitfield





_description: _

###genIUType glm::bitfieldRotateLeft(In, Shift)

<!--
_syntax: glm::bitfieldRotateLeft(In, Shift)_
_name: glm::bitfieldRotateLeft_
_returns: genIUType_
_returns_description: _
_parameters: genIUType In, int Shift_
_version_started: 0.10.0_
_version_deprecated: _
_summary: _
_constant: False_
_static: False_
_visible: True_
_advanced: False_
-->

_inlined_description: _

Rotate all bits to the left. All the bits dropped in the left side are inserted back on the right side.


**See also**: gtc_bitfield





_description: _
